languages.text: Хранящаяся на корабле призма гемункула вновь активировалась! Авгуры фиксируют еще один друкарский маяк, но в этот раз темный артефакт из лаборатории гемункула устанавливает связь с ним, едва оказавшись на орбите. Призма указывает следующие координаты, но маяк на поверхности планеты продолжает излучать зловещий сигнал.

traits.locale_text: Хранящаяся на корабле призма гемункула вновь активировалась! Авгуры фикисруют еще один друкарский маяк, но в этот раз темный артефакт из лаборатории гемункула устанавливает связь с ним, едва оказавшись на орбите. Призма указывает следующие координаты, но маяк на поверхности планеты продолжает излучать зловещий сигнал.

languages.text: The Haemonculus's prism that had been kept aboard the ship has activated again! Augurs detect another Drukhari beacon, only this time the dark artefact from the Haemonculus's laboratory establishes connection with it as soon as the ship enters orbit. The prism shows the next set of coordinates, but the beacon on the planet's surface continues emitting its sinister signal.
languages.original_text: Хранящаяся на корабле призма гемункула вновь активировалась! Авгуры фиксируют еще один друкарский маяк, но в этот раз темный артефакт из лаборатории гемункула устанавливает связь с ним, едва оказавшись на орбите. Призма указывает следующие координаты, но маяк на поверхности планеты продолжает излучать зловещий сигнал.

Augurs detect another Drukhari beacon, only this time the dark artifact from the Haemonculus's laboratory establishes connection with it as soon as it enters orbit. The prism shows the next set of coordinates, but the beacon on the planet's surface continues emitting its sinister signal.

Augurs detect another Drukhari beacon, only this time the dark artefact from the Haemonculus's laboratory establishes connection with it as soon as the ship enters orbit. The prism shows the next set of coordinates, but the beacon on the planet's surface continues emitting its sinister signal.

The Haemonculus's prism that had been kept aboard the ship has activated again! Augurs detect another Drukhari beacon, only this time the dark artefact from the Haemonculus's laboratory establishes connection with it as soon as the ship enters orbit. The prism shows the next set of coordinates, but the beacon on the planet's surface continues emitting its sinister signal.

languages.text: 放置在飞船上的血伶人棱镜再次激活了！俄歇阵列发现了另一处黑暗灵族的信标。只不过这次，飞船才刚刚进入轨道，血伶人实验室的黑暗造物就与信标建立了联系。棱镜展示了下一组坐标，但行星表面的信标仍在不断发出不祥的信号。
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus's prism that had been kept aboard the ship has activated again! Augurs detect another Drukhari beacon, only this time the dark artefact from the Haemonculus's laboratory establishes connection with it as soon as the ship enters orbit. The prism shows the next set of coordinates, but the beacon on the planet's surface continues emitting its sinister signal.

traits.locale_text: 放置在飞船上的血伶人棱镜再次激活了！俄歇阵列发现了另一处黑暗灵族的信标。只不过这次，飞船才刚刚进入轨道，血伶人实验室的黑暗造物就与信标建立了联系。棱镜展示了下一组坐标，但行星表面的信标仍在不断发出不祥的信号。

languages.text: 船内に保管されていたハモンキュラスのプリズムが再び作動した！スキャナーは別のデュカーリのビーコンを探知するが、今回は船が軌道に乗るとすぐに、ハモンキュラスの研究室にあった暗のアーチファクトが接続を確立する。プリズムは次の座標を示すが、惑星表面のビーコンは不吉な信号を発し続けている。
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus's prism that had been kept aboard the ship has activated again! Augurs detect another Drukhari beacon, only this time the dark artefact from the Haemonculus's laboratory establishes connection with it as soon as the ship enters orbit. The prism shows the next set of coordinates, but the beacon on the planet's surface continues emitting its sinister signal.

traits.locale_text: 船内に保管されていたハモンキュラスのプリズムが再び作動した！スキャナーは別のデュカーリのビーコンを探知するが、今回は船が軌道に乗るとすぐに、ハモンキュラスの研究室にあった暗のアーチファクトが接続を確立する。プリズムは次の座標を示すが、惑星表面のビーコンは不吉な信号を発し続けている。

languages.text: ¡El prisma del Hemónculo que se había guardado a bordo de la nave se ha activado de nuevo! Los augures han detectado otra baliza Drukhari, sólo que esta vez el artefacto oscuro del laboratorio del Hemónculo establece conexión con ella en cuanto la nave entra en órbita. El prisma muestra el siguiente conjunto de coordenadas, pero la baliza de la superficie del planeta sigue emitiendo su siniestra señal.
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus's prism that had been kept aboard the ship has activated again! Augurs detect another Drukhari beacon, only this time the dark artefact from the Haemonculus's laboratory establishes connection with it as soon as the ship enters orbit. The prism shows the next set of coordinates, but the beacon on the planet's surface continues emitting its sinister signal.

traits.locale_text: ¡El prisma del Hemónculo que se había guardado a bordo de la nave se ha activado de nuevo! Los augures han detectado otra baliza Drukhari, sólo que esta vez el artefacto oscuro del laboratorio del Hemónculo establece conexión con ella en cuanto la nave entra en órbita. El prisma muestra el siguiente conjunto de coordenadas, pero la baliza de la superficie del planeta sigue emitiendo su siniestra señal.

languages.text: Das Prisma des Haemonculus, das an Bord des Schiffes aufbewahrt wurde, hat sich wieder aktiviert! Auguren entdecken einen weiteren Drukhari-Sender, nur verbindet sich das dunkle Artefakt aus dem Labor des Haemonculus diesmal augenblicklich damit, sobald das Schiff sich im Orbit befindet. Das Prisma zeigt die nächsten Koordinaten an, doch der Sender auf der Oberfläche des Planeten sendet sein düsteres Signal weiter aus.
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus's prism that had been kept aboard the ship has activated again! Augurs detect another Drukhari beacon, only this time the dark artefact from the Haemonculus's laboratory establishes connection with it as soon as the ship enters orbit. The prism shows the next set of coordinates, but the beacon on the planet's surface continues emitting its sinister signal.

traits.locale_text: Das Prisma des Haemonculus, das an Bord des Schiffes aufbewahrt wurde, hat sich wieder aktiviert! Auguren entdecken einen weiteren Drukhari-Sender, nur verbindet sich das dunkle Artefakt aus dem Labor des Haemonculus diesmal augenblicklich damit, sobald das Schiff sich im Orbit befindet. Das Prisma zeigt die nächsten Koordinaten an, doch der Sender auf der Oberfläche des Planeten sendet sein düsteres Signal weiter aus.

languages.text: Le prisme de l'hémoncule conservé à bord s'active de nouveau ! Les augures repèrent une autre balise drukhari, mais cette fois, l'artefact noir récupéré dans le laboratoire établit la connexion dès que le vaisseau entre en orbite. Sur le prisme s'affichent les coordonnées suivantes, ce qui n'empêche pas la balise implantée à la surface de continuer à émettre son signal sinistre.
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus's prism that had been kept aboard the ship has activated again! Augurs detect another Drukhari beacon, only this time the dark artefact from the Haemonculus's laboratory establishes connection with it as soon as the ship enters orbit. The prism shows the next set of coordinates, but the beacon on the planet's surface continues emitting its sinister signal.

traits.locale_text: Le prisme de l'hémoncule conservé à bord s'active de nouveau ! Les augures repèrent une autre balise drukhari, mais cette fois, l'artefact noir récupéré dans le laboratoire établit la connexion dès que le vaisseau entre en orbite. Sur le prisme s'affichent les coordonnées suivantes, ce qui n'empêche pas la balise implantée à la surface de continuer à émettre son signal sinistre.

languages.text: Gemide tutulan Haimonkulus prizması, yeniden aktifleşiyor! Alametler, bir başka Drukhari parıldağını tespit ediyor. Ancak bu kez Haimonkulus'un laboratuvarından çıkarılan kara eser, gemi yörüngeye girer girmez parıldakla bağlantı kuruyor. Prizma bir sonraki koordinat dizisini gösterirken gezegenin yüzeyindeki parıldak, uğursuz sinyalini yaymaya devam ediyor.
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus's prism that had been kept aboard the ship has activated again! Augurs detect another Drukhari beacon, only this time the dark artefact from the Haemonculus's laboratory establishes connection with it as soon as the ship enters orbit. The prism shows the next set of coordinates, but the beacon on the planet's surface continues emitting its sinister signal.
